mapper.select: SELECT DATE(c.created_at) AS date, COUNT(c.id) AS registeredCounsels, COUNT(IF(DATEDIFF(DATE(a.created_at), DATE(c.created_at)) < 2, 1, NULL)) AS completedCounsels, COUNT(IF((DATEDIFF(DATE(a.created_at), DATE(c.created_at)) > 2) || (ISNULL(a.created_at)), 1, NULL)) AS delayedCounsels FROM counsel c LEFT JOIN answer a ON c.id = a.counsel_id WHERE c.category_id = #{categoryId} AND c.created_at BETWEEN #{startDate} AND #{endDate} GROUP BY date

SELECT DATE(c.created_at) AS date, c.charger_id AS counselorId, COUNT(a.id) AS completedCounsels, COUNT(IF(DATEDIFF(DATE(a.created_at), DATE(c.created_at)) < 2, 1, NULL)) AS counselsProcessedNormally, COUNT(IF((DATEDIFF(DATE(a.created_at), DATE(c.created_at)) > 2) || (ISNULL(a.created_at)), 1, NULL)) AS delayedCounsels FROM counsel c LEFT JOIN answer a ON c.id = a.counsel_id WHERE c.category_id = #{categoryId} AND c.created_at BETWEEN #{startDate} AND #{endDate} GROUP BY counselorId, date ORDER BY counselsProcessedNormally DESC
